content: these socks are a collaboration with the lab fibers and share the same inspiration as my winter rose shawl though the stitches are slightly different both patterns are meant to remind us that just like roses some things and indeed people may look delicate and fragile but also be strong and resilient adaptable and comforting i hope these pretty comfy socks bring you joy languages i am please to announce that the pattern is now also available in japanese my heartfelt thanks to hayato from the keitoya shop in japan who has translated the pdf i invite you to visit their shop in person or on their website https //shop keitoyajp com/ yarn and notions yarn 100g fingering weight sample in everyday sock fingering by the lab fibers colourway flamingo needles 2 5mm ***use 2 75mm for the cuff if you are a tight knitter because of the cables i use needles with a long cable for magic loop or use your preferred needles such as 9 in circulars or dpns gauge 8sts = 1 inch in stockinette this pattern includes instructions for 3 sizes small 56 stitches medium 64 stitches large 72 stitches this pattern also includes instructions for a shortie socks option as well as alternate cuff and heel flap options charts for the pattern repeats are also provided happy knitting
